name: Catch Me In Miami
description:
When you arrive in Miami during its '80s crimewave, you meet its most handsome outlaw.

When your local cineplex hosts an all-night gangster movie marathon, you're thrilled to get a chance to re-watch those timeless classics on the big screen. As soon as you step inside the theatre, you find yourself literally transported into your favorite eras of the silver screen, where you're wooed by your favorite cinematic characters on the wrong side of the law: A cunning gangster from the '20s, a mysterious femme fatale from the '50s, a slick action hero from the '80s. Each of these outlaws offers you an adventure straight out of the movies, and you must decide which starring role is best for you. 

This story can be found by downloading the Fictif app for free, available in the Google Play Store and App Store. Fictif contains multiple visual novel stories to play in various genres.
